document_data.caption: Map showing the tannery (labeled 240), circa [[1357 DR]].
document_data.name: Torpus's Tannery
document_data.mainbody: This was a tannery owned by [[Torpus|Torpus the Tanner]] in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].<ref>
document_data.Structure: This building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: This tannery stood at the corner of [[Hog Street]] and [[Tower Trail]].
